kit.leader_skill: "Peppy Gals" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +200%; "Turtle School" or "DB Saga" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +170%, plus an additional HP, ATK & DEF +30% for characters who also belong to the "Bond of Master and Disciple" or "Kamehameha" Category ("Peppy Gals" Category characters excluded)

super_attack.name: Turtle School Dance
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage to enemy; Unit Super Attack; Master and Disciple Kamehameha; Raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage; A great chance of stunning the enemy; Activation Conditions; Activated when there is an ally; whose name includes "Goku (Youth)" or; "Krillin (Youth)" attacking in the same turn; Unit Super Attack; Max Power Kamehameha; Raises ATK; Greatly raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes immense damage; A great chance of stunning the enemy; Activation Conditions; Activated when there is an ally; whose name includes "Bulma"; attacking in the same turn

passive_skill.name: Vigorous Hermit
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Damage reduction rate 30% up for 7 turn(s); (Once) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Once) "Turtle School" or "Peppy Gals" Category allies' Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 50% up (self excluded); When another 2 or more "Turtle School" Category allies are on the team: Ki +3; Damage reduction rate 20% up; ATK & DEF 150% up and launches an additional Super Attack when attacking with 12 or more Ki; Per "Peppy Gals" Category ally attacking in the same turn: ATK & DEF 82% up; When there is an ally whose name includes "Bulma" attacking in the same turn: ATK 82% up; High chance of performing a critical hit

active_skill.name: Turtle School's Teachings
active_skill.effect: Recovers 50% HP; For 1 turn,; all allies' Ki +3; ATK & DEF +30%
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 70% or less starting from the 3rd turn from the start of battle Or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
